mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PAGE ( F_PAGE_ID, F_OWNER_PAGE_SET_ID, F_CONTEXT_CLASS_ID, F_WIDTH, F_HEIGHT, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ pageId }, #{ ownerPageSetId }, #{ contextClassId }, #{ width }, #{ height }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PAGE SET F_OWNER_PAGE_SET_ID = #{ ownerPageSetId }, F_CONTEXT_CLASS_ID = #{ contextClassId }, F_WIDTH = #{ width }, F_HEIGHT = #{ height }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_PAGE_ID = #{ pageId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_PAGE_ID AS "pageId", T1.F_OWNER_PAGE_SET_ID AS "ownerPageSetId", T1.F_CONTEXT_CLASS_ID AS "contextClassId", T1.F_WIDTH AS "width", T1.F_HEIGHT AS "height", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T2.F_PAGE_SET_NAME || '(' || T1.F_WIDTH || 'x' || T1.F_HEIGHT || ')' AS "_title", T2.F_PAGE_SET_NAME AS "owner_title", T3.F_CLASS_NAME || '(' || T3.F_TITLE || ')' AS "context_title" FROM T_PAGE T1 LEFT JOIN T_PAGE_SET T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PAGE_SET_ID = T2.F_PAGE_SET_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T3 ON T1.F_CONTEXT_CLASS_ID = T3.F_CLASS_ID WHERE T1.F_PAGE_ID = #{ pageId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F_PAGE_ID) AS "maxPageId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_PAGE T1

SELECT T1.F_PAGE_SET_ID AS "pageSetId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_PAGE_SET_NAME AS "pageSetName", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_PAGE_SET_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_PAGE_SET T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_PAGE_SET_ID = #{ ownerPageSetId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F_PAGE_SET_ID) AS "maxPageSetId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_PAGE_SET T1
T1.F_PAGE_SET_NAME LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'

SELECT T1.F_CLASS_ID AS "classId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_CLASS_NAME AS "className", T1.F_ORDER_EXPR AS "orderExpr", T1.F_TITLE_EXPR AS "titleExpr", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_CLASS_NAME || '(' || T1.F_TITLE || ')' AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_CLASS T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_CLASS_ID = #{ contextClassId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F_CLASS_ID) AS "maxClassId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_CLASS T1
T1.F_CLASS_NAME || '(' || T1.F_TITLE || ')' LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'
SELECT MAX(T1.F_LAYOUT_ID) AS "maxLayoutId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_LAYOUT T1 WHERE F_OWNER_PAGE_ID = #{ content.pageId }
